About Me

Hi, my name’s Spyros and I’m a senior network constructor and undergraduate student of Ionian University at the Department of Informatics. As well as constructing wireless networks I also have experience making websites and e-shops. I have worked at a number of companies gaining teamwork and leadership skills.

I am most skilled in: ubiquiti and Mikrotik

Experience

Messinian Networks | MNET | Kalamata

Senior Network Constructor

September 2016 - August 2020

Wireless Network Construction | Internet Provider

As Network Constructor for MNET I’ve worked on establishing wireless links up to 15km.

Education

Ionian University | Department of Informatics | Corfu

BSc Information Systems

2015 - 2022

The Ionian University was founded in 1984, the same year as the University of Thessaly and the University of the Aegean. The university comprises five faculties and twelve departments. Its seat is in Corfu, with university units in Lefkada, Kefalonia and Zakynthos.

During my stay at Corfu I wanted to practice everything i got learned in class. That’s why from the start of my second year in the university I started searching for work.
